instructions.name: add_share_class
docs: Adds a new share class to a fund.
- `share_class_metadata`: An instance of `ShareClassModel` containing the metadata for the new share class.

instructions.name: burn_share
docs: Burns a specified amount of shares for the given share class.
- `share_class_id`: The id of the share class to burn shares for.
- `amount`: The amount of shares to burn.

instructions.name: close_fund
docs: Closes a fund and releases its resources.

instructions.name: close_share_class
docs: Closes a share class and releases its resources.
- `share_class_id`: The id of the share class to be closed.

instructions.name: close_token_accounts
docs: Closes token accounts owned by the treasury.

instructions.name: drift_deposit
docs: - `market_index`: Index of the drift spot market.

instructions.name: drift_initialize
docs: Initializes a drift account owned by fund treasury and creates a subaccount.

instructions.name: drift_place_orders
docs: - Additional permission Permission::DriftSpotMarket or Permission::DriftPerpMarket is required depending on market type.

instructions.name: drift_update_user_delegate
docs: Sets a delegate on the specified sub account.

instructions.name: drift_update_user_margin_trading_enabled
docs: - `margin_trading_enabled`: Whether to enable or disable margin trading.

instructions.name: drift_withdraw
docs: - `market_index`: Index of the drift spot market.

instructions.name: force_transfer_share
docs: Forcefully transfers a specified amount of shares from one account to another.
- `share_class_id`: The id of the share class to transfer shares for.
- `amount`: The amount of shares to transfer.

instructions.name: increase_locked_amount
docs: Increases the locked amount (aka stakes JUP).
- `amount`: The amount of JUP to stake.

instructions.name: initialize_and_delegate_stake
docs: Initializes a stake account and delegates it to a validator.
- `lamports`: The amount of SOL to initialize the stake account with.
- `stake_account_id`: The ID of the stake account to initialize.
- `stake_account_bump`: The bump seed for the stake account.

instructions.name: initialize_fund
docs: Initializes a fund from the provided FundModel instance.
- `fund`: An instance of `FundModel` containing the details of the fund to be initialized.

instructions.name: jupiter_swap
docs: - `amount`: The amount of asset to swap.
- Permission::JupiterSwapFundAssets: input and output are in the assets allowlist.
- Permission::JupiterSwapLst: input and output assets are both LST.

accounts.name: output_signer_ata
docs: TODO: Do we really need output_signer_ata?

instructions.name: marinade_claim_tickets
docs: Claims tickets that were unstaked in the previous epoch to get SOL.

instructions.name: marinade_delayed_unstake
docs: Unstakes mSOL to get a ticket that can be claimed at the next epoch.

instructions.name: marinade_deposit_sol
docs: - `lamports`: The amount of SOL to deposit.

instructions.name: marinade_deposit_stake
docs: Deposits a stake account to get mSOL.

instructions.name: marinade_liquid_unstake
docs: Unstakes mSOL to get SOL immediately.

instructions.name: mint_share
docs: Mints a specified amount of shares for the given share class.
- `share_class_id`: The id of the share class to mint shares for.
- `amount`: The amount of shares to mint.

instructions.name: open_partial_unstaking
docs: - `amount`: The amount of JUP to partially unstake.
- `memo`: The memo for the partial unstaking.

instructions.name: redeem
docs: Redeems a specified amount of shares.
- `amount`: The amount of shares to redeem.
- `skip_state`: Should always be true (state check to be implemented).

instructions.name: redelegate_stake
docs: Redelegates an existing stake account to a new validator (a new stake account will be created).
- `new_stake_account_id`: The ID of the new stake account.
- `new_stake_account_bump`: The bump seed for the new stake account.

instructions.name: set_subscribe_redeem_enabled
docs: Enables or disables the subscribe and redeem functionality for the fund.
This allows the manager to pause/unpause subscription and redemption of a fund.
- `enabled`: A boolean indicating whether to enable or disable the subscribe and redeem functionality.

instructions.name: set_token_accounts_states
docs: Sets the frozen state of the token accounts for the specified share class.
- `share_class_id`: The id of the share class to set the frozen state for.

instructions.name: split_stake_account
docs: Splits from an existing stake account to get a new stake account.
- `lamports`: The amount of SOL to split.
- `new_stake_account_id`: The ID of the new stake account.
- `new_stake_account_bump`: The bump seed for the new stake account.

instructions.name: stake_pool_deposit_sol
docs: Deposits SOL to a stake pool to get pool token.
- `lamports`: The amount of SOL to deposit.
- IntegrationName::SplStakePool or IntegrationName::SanctumStakePool, depending on the stake pool program used.

instructions.name: stake_pool_deposit_stake
docs: Deposits a stake account to a stake pool to get pool token.
- IntegrationName::SplStakePool or IntegrationName::SanctumStakePool, depending on the stake pool program used.

instructions.name: stake_pool_withdraw_sol
docs: Unstakes from pool token to get SOL immediately.
- `pool_token_amount`: Amount of pool token to unstake.
- IntegrationName::SplStakePool or IntegrationName::SanctumStakePool, depending on the stake pool program used.

instructions.name: stake_pool_withdraw_stake
docs: Unstakes from pool token into a stake account.
- `pool_token_amount`: Amount of pool token to unstake.
- IntegrationName::SplStakePool or IntegrationName::SanctumStakePool, depending on the stake pool program used.

instructions.name: subscribe
docs: Subscribes to a specified amount of shares.
- `amount`: The amount of shares to subscribe.
- `skip_state`: Should always be true (state check to be implemented).

instructions.name: update_fund
docs: Updates an existing fund with new parameters.
- `fund`: An instance of `FundModel` containing the updated details of the fund.

instructions.name: update_share_class
docs: Updates an existing share class with new metadata.
- `share_class_id`: The id of the share class to be updated.
- `share_class_metadata`: An instance of `ShareClassModel` containing the updated metadata for the new share class.

instructions.name: withdraw
docs: Withdraw an asset from fund treasury into manager's wallet.

instructions.name: wsol_unwrap
docs: Unwraps all wSOL to get SOL.

instructions.name: wsol_wrap
docs: - `lamports`: The amount of SOL to wrap.

errors.name: InvalidAssetsWeights
errors.msg: Number of weights should match number of assets
